thread.title: ‘The Biological Mind’ Review: Identify Your Self

author: Steven Poole
title: ‘The Biological Mind’ Review: Identify Your Self
text:
If you were a brain in a vat, would you still be you? Imagine, as in “The Matrix,” that wires hooked up to your brain were feeding it exactly the same electrical impulses as it normally gets from your eyes, ears and so on, controlled by a computer running a virtual-reality simulation that was indistinguishable from reality. Would anything be missing? Can you be completely sure that this isn’t, in fact, the situation you find yourself in right now as you read this paragraph?
This philosophical puzzle has been posed, in various...
